title: Geo
description: The geographic location where an event was observed.

countryCode.description:
The two-character ISO 3166-1 alpha code for the country.
See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1

regionCode.description:
String up to three characters long contain the subdivision portion
of the ISO 3166-2code.

stateProvince.description: The state, or province portion of the observation.

postalCode.description:
The postal code of the location. Postal codes are not available for
all countries. In some countries, this will only contain part of
the postal code.

metroCode.description:
The metro code of the location if the location is in the US.
See Google AdWords API metro codes.

mmLocationId.description:
A numeric identifier (location ID) that is obtained from
Maxmindâ€™s GeoIP package that represents the Geo.
See GeoIPCity-134-Location.csv.

msaId.description: The metro survey area where the observation occurred.

geographicRegion.description:
The name of a group of countries either by pure geographic designation as per
[http://www.itu.int/ITU-D/ict/definitions/regions/index.html](http://www.itu.int/ITU-D/ict/definitions/regions/index.html),
or common market designation (EMEA, EMEIA).
